In recent years, Patricia has continued to work in film and television, starring in shows like "The Act" (2019) and "Escape at Dannemora" (2018). She has also been a vocal advocate for social justice and women's rights, using her platform to raise awareness and support for various causes.

Patricia Arquette is not only an accomplished actress but also a compassionate and driven individual, leaving a lasting impact on the entertainment industry and beyond.
